classification: Woodwork; Tools, Equipment and Utilitarian Objects
creditline: Gift of Raymond A. and Ruth A. Reister
description: cup and handle appearing in form of hand and arm; cup has cylindrical top that rests on round bottom; top has carved patterns of zigzags in narrow rows; bottom has design with thick crisscrossed lines; handle is woven design and the part that connects to cup is a hand with four fingers; the top of the hand has a design carved into it; the piece is a dark brown hue
title: Cup
